ygData.subject: Re: Lore Song suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: If someone is going to suggest something, ask for it to be a party song instead of a self song.  That would solve the no trade issue. Athren
ygData.messageBody:
If someone is going to suggest something, ask for it to be a party song
instead of a self song. That would solve the no trade issue.

Athren

On Wed, 22 Sep 1999, Talies the Wanderer wrote:

> At 12:57 AM 9/22/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >
> >
> > It would be nice if the song would work when cast on items in a =
> > trade window. This would allow us to help other players with No Drop/No =
> > Trade identify the lore...
> >
> > Slyde
>
>
> Just tested/verified this. Doesn't work. You can't put nodrop items in the
> trade window.
>
> Talies
